title: TESTING
fullText:
The testing of the installation shall be performed in accordance with the testing requirements of AS/NZS 3000. In addition to those requirements, the following applies:

(a) The installation shall be tested according to relevant standards and/or manufacturer's instructions for the equipment and the energy source.

(b) Where an export control function is used or device is installed, the settings and operation of the export limit functions shall be tested.
